sub_title: Engaging consumers through excellent content, eye-catching design, and result-driven marketing
summary:
I am a citizen of the world and by the age of 27 have acquired an extensive international experience. I was selected as one of 5 people across an entire Russia to win an Erasmus Mundus Aurora II Exchange grant to study media, psychology and journalism for a semester at the University of Groningen in the Netherlands (ranked Top-100 worldwide). I earlier participated in an impactful volunteering experience at the dogs’ refugee camp in Naples, Italy. I graduated with a Master’s Degree in Marketing and Communication with Honors at ESEI International Business School in Barcelona, Spain and later took an internship in an international hospitality placement company there as well. My last major experience was working as a Business Development Manager at a 3D visualization and innovative global business services company with top-ranked developers clients (WCT, 1 Pavilion, Sunway, UMLand, MRCB, Mah Sing and many others) in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. 

In my work, I am focused on building authentic engagement: it is not simply about promoting a product or writing about a topic with a correct set of tools but rather making sure that each interaction with a brand is a fascinating experience that provides true value to a potential customer.

My knowledge of persuasive communication techniques combined with a deep interest in digital brand presence along with an experience of working with educational, retail, IT, and design businesses will make me a resourceful addition to the team who is focused on solutions.
